Query.Description: Sql ตัวอย่าง แบบปกติ 1
Query.SQL:
Select t.*, p.province_name , 'ข้อมูล' tdesc , t.province_code as newcode From blte0district t left outer join bltd0province p on ( t.province_code = p.province_code )
t.province_code = '' t.district_code = '' t.district_name like '%%'

Column.Header: รหัสจังหวัด
ชื่อจังหวัด
รหัสแขวง/อำเภอ
ชื่อแขวง/อำเภอ

Query.SQL: select 1 as col1

Select msg_code, msg_desc, msg_flag, msg_mcode From TB_MESSAGE t
msg_mcode is not null

select * from ( ( select r.func_code
from SC_USER_PERMIT_ROLE t left join SC_ROLE_PERMISSTION r on (t.role_code = r.role_code) where t.user_code = '' and r.func_code = '' ) union ( select t.func_code
from SC_USER_PERMIT_FUNCTION t where t.user_code = '' and t.func_code = '' ) ) a order by func_code

select bankid, bankname, banknamesh, bankdesc from tb_bank t
t.bankid = '' t.bankname like '%%' t.banknamesh like '%%'

select currencyid, currencyname, currencydesc from tb_currency t
t.currencyid = '' t.currencyname like '%%' t.currencydesc like '%%'

select id, dsrptvalue, dscptdesc from tb_descriptioncode t
t.dsrptvalue = '' t.dscptdesc like '%%'

SELECT invcomid, companyname, taxid, remark FROM accountdb.invoicecompany t
t.invcomid = '' t.companyname like '%%' t.taxid = ''

SELECT vat, description FROM accountdb.tb_vat t
t.vat = '' t.description like '%%'

SELECT tax, description FROM accountdb.tb_whtax t
t.tax = '' t.description like '%%'

SELECT payvalue, paydesc FROM tb_payment_type t
t.payvalue = '' t.paydesc like '%%'

SELECT revalue, redesc FROM tb_received_type t
t.revalue = '' t.redesc like '%%'

SELECT revvalue, revdesc FROM tb_received_voucherno t
t.revvalue = '' t.revdesc like '%%'

SELECT d.dailyid, d.dailydate, db_dsf(d.dailydate) dailydate_disp, d.companyid, d.companyname, d.voucherno, d.docno, concat(d.voucherno,d.docno) vouchernodocno, d.jobref, d.transecsionno, d.dailytype, d.descriptioncode, s.dscptdesc, d.currency, money(d.paidamount) paidamount, d.payby, b.bankname, d.remark FROM daily d left outer join tb_descriptioncode s on(d.descriptioncode = s.dsrptvalue) left outer join tb_bank b on (d.payby = b.bankid)
d.receivedamount <> 0.00
d.dailydate >= '' d.dailydate <= '' d.jobno = ''

SELECT d.dailyid, d.dailydate, db_dsf(d.dailydate) dailydate_disp, d.companyid, d.companyname, d.voucherno, d.docno, concat(d.voucherno,d.docno) vouchernodocno, d.jobref, d.transecsionno, d.dailytype, d.descriptioncode, s.dscptdesc, d.currency, money(d.paidamount) paidamount, d.payby, b.bankname, d.remark FROM daily d left outer join tb_descriptioncode s on(d.descriptioncode = s.dsrptvalue) left outer join tb_bank b on (d.payby = b.bankid)
d.paidamount <> 0.00
d.dailydate >= '' d.dailydate <= '' d.jobno = ''

SELECT i.invcomid , i.company , ic.remark ,i.invdate FROM invoicecompany ic left join invoice i on (ic.invcomid = i.invcomid) where i.invcomid is not null
and i.invcomid = '' and i.company = '' and i.invdate = ''
group by ic.invcomid

Query.Description: ตารางจังหวัด
Query.SQL:
select t.prov_code, t.prov_name from TB01_PROVINCE t
t.prov_code = '' t.prov_name like '%%'

Column.Header: รหัสจังหวัด
ชื่อจังหวัด

Query.ZoomTitle: ตารางจังหวัด

Query.Description: ตารางอำเภอ/เขต
Query.SQL:
select t1.prov_code, t1.prov_name, t2.ampr_code, t2.ampr_name from TB02_AMPHUR t2, TB01_PROVINCE t1
t2.prov_code = t1.prov_code t2.prov_code = '' t2.ampr_code = '' t2.ampr_name like '%%'

Column.Header: รหัสอำเภอ/เขต
ชื่ออำเภอ/เขต

Query.ZoomTitle: ตารางอำเภอ/เขต

Query.Description: ตารางตำบล/แขวง
Query.SQL:
select t1.prov_code, t1.prov_name, t2.ampr_code, t2.ampr_name, t3.tumb_code, t3.tumb_name , t3.zip_code from TB02_AMPHUR t2, TB01_PROVINCE t1, TB03_TUMBOL t3
t3.ampr_code = t2.ampr_code and t3.prov_code = t1.prov_code t3.prov_code = '' t3.ampr_code = '' t3.tumb_code = '' t3.tumb_name like '%%'

Column.Header: ชื่อตำบล/แขวง
ชื่ออำเภอ/เขต
ชื่อจังหวัด

Query.ZoomTitle: ตารางตำบล/แขวง

Query.Description: ตารางอำเภอ/เขต
Query.SQL:
select * from jobsubject t
t.jobmode = ''

Query.Description: ตารางอำเภอ/เขต
Query.SQL:
select * from tb_group t
t.id = '' t.type = ''

Query.Description: ตารางอำเภอ/เขต
Query.SQL:
SELECT t.bankid, t.bankname, t.banknamesh, t.bankdesc FROM tb_bank t
t.bankid = ''

SELECT t.currencyid, t.currencyname, t.currencydesc FROM tb_currency t
t.currencyid = '' t.currencyname = ''

Query.Description: ตารางอำเภอ/เขต
Query.SQL:
SELECT CAST(t.vat as CHAR) as vat FROM tb_vat t
t.vat = ''

Query.Description: ตารางอำเภอ/เขต
Query.SQL:
SELECT CAST(t.tax as CHAR) as tax FROM tb_whtax t
t.tax = ''

Query.Description: ตารางอำเภอ/เขต
Query.SQL:
SELECT dsrptvalue, dscptdesc , concat(dsrptvalue,'-',dscptdesc) dsrptvalue_disp FROM tb_descriptioncode t
t.dsrptvalue = ''

Query.Description: ตารางอำเภอ/เขต
Query.SQL:
SELECT revalue, redesc , concat(revalue,'-',redesc) revalue_disp FROM tb_received_type t
t.revalue = ''

Query.Description: ตารางอำเภอ/เขต
Query.SQL:
SELECT payvalue, paydesc , concat(payvalue,'-',paydesc) payvalue_disp FROM tb_payment_type t
t.payvalue = ''

Query.Description: ตารางอำเภอ/เขต
Query.SQL:
SELECT revvalue, revdesc , concat(revvalue,'-',revdesc) revvalue_disp FROM tb_received_voucherno t
t.revvalue = ''

SELECT t.invcomid, t.companyname, t.remark FROM invoicecompany t
t.invcomid = '' t.companyname like '%%'
Query.ZoomTitle: ตารางชื่อบริษัท

Query.SQL:
SELECT d.dailydate, DB_DSF(d.dailydate) dailydate_disp, d.jobno, d.docno_code, d.docno, concat(g.data,'-',docno) docno_disp, d.description, d.chqno, d.no, d.received_cash, d.received_bank, d.received_cr, d.payment_cash, d.payment_bank, d.payment_cr, d.balance_cash, d.balance_cr, d.vendor FROM daily d left outer join tb_group g on ( d.docno_code = g.id and g.type = '2' ) left outer join tb_group g1 on ( d.no = g1.id and g1.type = '1' )
d.dailydate = '' d.jobno = ''
Query.ZoomTitle: ตารางบันทึกประจำวัน

Query.Description: ตารางจังหวัด
Query.SQL:
select jobno, consignee,vendor_name,kind_of_transport from jobdata t
t.jobno = '' t.consignee like '%%' t.vendor_name like '%%' t.kind_of_transport = ''

Query.Description: ตารางอำเภอ/เขต
Query.SQL:
SELECT DB_DSF(t.dailydate) dailydate, t.dailytype, t.descriptioncode, concat(t.voucherno,'',t.docno) as voucherno_disp, t.jobref, t.transecsionno, t.payby, b.bankname, t.receivedamount, t.amount, t.exchangerate, t.currency, c.currencyname, t.remark, case when t.receivesuccess is null then 'N' else t.receivesuccess end receivesuccess FROM daily t left outer join tb_bank b on (payby = b.bankid) left outer join tb_currency c on (t.currency = c.currencyid)
t.paidamount = 0.00 and t.amount2 = 0.00 t.dailydate >= '' t.dailydate <= '' t.jobref = '' t.receivesuccess = ''

Query.Description: ตารางอำเภอ/เขต
Query.SQL:
SELECT DB_DSF(t.dailydate) dailydate, t.dailytype, t.descriptioncode, concat(t.voucherno,'',t.docno) as voucherno_disp, t.jobref, t.transecsionno, t.payby, b.bankname, t.paidamount, t.amount2, t.exchangerate, t.currency, c.currencyname, t.remark, case when t.paymentsuccess is null then 'N' else t.paymentsuccess end paymentsuccess FROM daily t left outer join tb_bank b on (payby = b.bankid) left outer join tb_currency c on (t.currency = c.currencyid)
t.receivedamount = 0.00 and t.amount = 0.00 t.dailydate >= '' t.dailydate <= '' t.jobref = '' t.paymentsuccess = ''
